DOC.brief_title: Randomized Controlled 8-Week Crossover Evaluation of Compression Bandage Systems for Venous Leg Ulcers
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the product performance of a new 2-layer compression bandage for the treatment of venous leg ulcers. The new bandage is a 2-layer compression system. It will be used over primary dressings to provide the compression that is beneficial to venous leg ulcers.
